metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4793 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The clientIp function in CakePHP 3.2.4 and earlier allows remote attackersto spoof their IP via the CLIENT-IP HTTP header.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4793` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cakephp - 1.3.15-1+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
cakephp-scripts - 1.3.15-1+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cakephp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.15-1+deb7u2build0.14.04.1').
